mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.perms FROM graduate.sys_user_role ur left join graduate.sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left JOIN graduate.sys_menu sm on rm.menu_id = sm.id where sm.perms is not null and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select ur.* from graduate.sys_role_menu rm left join graduate.sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where rm.menu_id = #{menuId}
select distinct srm.menu_id from graduate.sys_user_role ur left join graduate.sys_role_menu srm on ur.role_id = srm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and srm.menu_id is not null
